name: Mental Health Crisis Line
description: SFDPH has a 24-hour mental health phoneline for people in crisis who need help. Assistance provided includes: - Assessments - Crisis interventions - Substance abuse How to Apply: - Call by phone Open Hours: - Open daily 24 hours Service Contact Information: - Phone number: (888) 246-3333
